content: **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** 1 http //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/3683376 **yarn** 82-164 yd/75-150 m/100g aran chunky or heavy worsted weight plied yarn **needles & notions** set 5mm/uk6/us8 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **gauge** 17 sts x 24 row to 4in/10cm on 5mm needles over st st **sizes** to fit sizes 17 20 22 24 in/ 43 51 56 61 cm finished size 15 17 18 75 20 75 in/ 38 35 43 47 75 52 5 cm **sample details** shown in the little knitting company geko 164yd/150m per 100g 85% wool 15% alpaca **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round increases & decreases **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour published october 2011 product code ww176fwideribbedbeanie
